item.title: Routing Protocol Admin Distance
item.description: Cause I get confused between Junos and IOS!! Cisco Protocol Admin Distances 0: Connected 1: Static 5: EIGRP summary route 20: eBGP 90: EIGRP (internal) 100: IGRP 110: OSPF 115: IS-IS 120: RIP 170: EIGRP (external) 200: iBGP Junos Route Preferences 0: Directly connected network 4: System routes 5: Static and Static LSPs 6: Static LSPs 7: RSVP-signaled LSPs 9: LDP-signaled LSPs 10: OSPF internal route 15: IS-IS Level 1 internal route 18: IS-IS Level 2 internal route 30 Redirects 40: Kernel 50: SNMP 55: Router discovery 100: RIP 100: RIPng 105: PIM 110: DVMRP 130: Aggregate 150: OSPF AS external routes 160: IS-IS Level 1 external route 165: IS-IS Level 2 external route 170: BGP 175: MSDP
